alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 1:24AM CDT until April 01 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lauderdale County in northwestern Alabama... Northern Colbert County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 124 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Cherokee, or 8 miles southeast of J P Coleman State Park, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Killen, Cherokee, St. Florian, Underwood-Petersville, Waterloo, Green Hill, Riverton and Wright. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Alabama.
